Country Rank
  • Welcome to Country Rank’s documentation!

Welcome to Country Rank’s documentation!

Country Rank is a Python project performing an exploratory data analysis (EDA) to rank countries based on their attractiveness for retirement. It also allows you to compare the performance of a country in different years.
